abstract: Will the F.C.C. open new doors to spectrum access?
snippet: Will the F.C.C. open new doors to spectrum access?
lead_paragraph: I RECENTLY watched a YouTube clip of a young man removing the memory chip from his iPhone with his teeth, in an attempt to “unlock” the device for use on a network other than the AT&T system for which the phone was exclusively sold. His gyrations were a particularly vivid reminder of the limits imposed on cellphones by the companies that run national wireless networks in the United States.

headline.main: In Search of Wireless Wiggle Room
headline.print_headline: In Search Of Wireless Wiggle Room
